Text: The Raven is the nineteenth solo album by Lou Reed.

--------------------
Text: The Raven (Lou Reed album):  It is a concept album released in 2003, recounting the short stories and poems of Edgar Allan Poe through word and song, and was based on his 2000 opera cowritten with Robert Wilson, "POEtry".
Triplets:<The Raven
2:
--------------------
Text: The Raven (Lou Reed album):  It also features new and very different versions of "The Bed" and "Perfect Day", two of the best-known songs in Reed's catalog, and the noise music song "Fire Music".
